PerfectNetExp.abs: 最早的鼠科（muridae）（Muridae）化石──前鼠（Antimus）发现于南亚晚中新世时期，可能起源于古仓鼠类。现生鼠科（muridae）分布有两个中心—非洲和 …

means.word_mean: 1. originally Old World rats now distributed worldwide; distinguished from the Cricetidae by typically lacking cheek pouches

auth_sentence.content: The family name Muridae is sometimes used in a broader sense to include all members of the superfamily Muroidea.
